MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 and SY14 postcode areas of Whitchurch and Malpas, affecting properties in Hetherston Green, St. Wenefredes Green and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible with a generator by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.28PM on 26th January 2021.
